name: Thrice Upon A Time (Post Jam Version)
name_original: Thrice Upon A Time (Post Jam Version)
description:
This is the new Post Jam Version of the original with improved animation!

Thrice Upon A Time is a set of three stories, going deeper and deeper into the past of three generations, and exploring three virtues.

Controls:

* Advance dialogue with Spacebar

* Play minigames with Arrow Keys and Spacebar

Created by Team Neon:

Sakura Magika, CloudiiSkyz, Azura Dark, and Tourmaline.
